most_active_tickets.title: Pieces app goes unresponsive on opening and every 5sec. Can't use it at all in any way
Facing error on Ubuntu while opening Pieces "DatabaseException"

common_issues.title: Pieces Desktop App Errors on Linux and Windows
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing various errors with the Pieces desktop app on Linux and Windows, including database exceptions, unresponsiveness, and model download failures.  Suggested solutions include updating to the latest Pieces OS version (11.1.1) and checking for system compatibility issues.

related_issues.title: Facing error on Ubuntu while opening Pieces "DatabaseException"
related_issues.text:
Facing error on Ubuntu while opening Pieces "DatabaseException"
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Linux

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Faccing "DatabaseException(Unable to load 'CouchbaseLiteVectorSearch' extenstion" (1), code : can'tOpenFile)" on my ubuntu desktop

**Key Points:**

* User @Rohit0072 reported an issue with the Pieces app.
* The issue was automatically triaged and routed to the proper team member.

**Problems Identified:**

* The specific problem reported by the user is not mentioned in the conversation excerpt.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* No specific solutions are proposed or implemented in this conversation excerpt.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The user can expect a follow-up from the Pieces team within 24 hours.

**Additional Notes:**

* The conversation is from February 9, 2025.

related_issues.title: Pieces app goes unresponsive on opening and every 5sec. Can't use it at all in any way
related_issues.text:
Pieces app goes unresponsive on opening and every 5sec. Can't use it at all in any way
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Linux

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Pieces app goes unresponsive and freezes a lot when trying to do anything, like trying to type in copilot chat or navigating through the menus. Can't use pieces app at all! Tried reinstalling it, but it made no difference. Desktop app version is 3.3.6

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e75595c0-31c8-4560-b08b-9ad3de8af6ab
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation:

**Key Points Raised:**

* User @94tejas created an issue for Pieces support.
* The issue was automatically triaged by a bot and routed to the appropriate team member.
* The bot provided helpful resources and related issues for the user to explore.

**Problems Identified:**

* The specific problem encountered by the user is not explicitly stated in the conversation snippet provided.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The bot recommends checking related issues and provided resources for potential solutions.
* No specific solutions were directly proposed or implemented in this conversation.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The user is awaiting a follow-up from the Pieces support team within 24 hours.

**Note:**

* This summary is based on the limited information provided in the conversation snippet. More context may be needed to fully understand the issue and its resolution.

related_issues.title: Models Download Fail
related_issues.text:
Models Download Fail
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.0.4

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I'm not able to download any of the models for ollama.
[log-02022025.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/18631166/log-02022025.txt)

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8e93857a-de7e-4e62-b3d0-c6a68b48631e
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points Raised:**
- Surya Sengupta reported an issue with Ollama failing to download.
- Brian from Pieces suggested updating to Pieces OS version 11.1.0 for potential stability improvements.

**Problems Identified:**
- Ollama installation failed.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**
- Update to Pieces OS version 11.1.0.

**Current Status/Outcome:**
- The issue is resolved after updating to Pieces OS version 11.1.0.

recommendations: **Prioritize 'Pieces Desktop App Errors on Linux and Windows'**: This issue has the highest frequency and is impacting users on multiple operating systems. Focus on identifying the root cause and providing a solution.
**Investigate Database Exceptions**: Tickets #619 and #618 suggest potential database issues on Linux. Analyze error logs and system configurations to resolve these.
**Improve Model Download Stability**: Ticket #608 highlights model download failures. Review the download process, dependency management, and error handling to ensure reliability.

**Gather More Information on Unresponsiveness**: While ticket #618 describes unresponsiveness, more details are needed. Encourage users to provide system specs, logs, and steps to reproduce the issue.
**Consider OS-Specific Troubleshooting**: Given the prevalence of Linux and Windows issues, develop OS-specific troubleshooting guides or FAQs for users.
**Monitor Pieces OS Version Adoption**: Encourage users to update to the latest Pieces OS version (11.1.1) and track the adoption rate to identify potential compatibility issues.
**Proactive Communication**:  Keep users informed about ongoing issues, planned maintenance, and resolution timelines through release notes, blog posts, or in-app notifications.
